full_text:
FYI - [b)(6), (b)(7)(C) is having me send this response to this reporter (in case you get similar inquiries):
Reporter: [b)(6), (b)(7)(C) NY1 News
Question:
I hope this email finds you well. I'm reaching out regarding Jeffrey Epstein's hearing tomorrow. Can you please provide us with more information on the timing and if there are any expectations for tomorrow.
Response:
Questions about a possible court hearing are best directed to an inmate's court of jurisdiction or legal counsel.
[b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
Public Information Office
Federal Bureau of Prisons
(202) 353-[b)(6)
>> [b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @charter.com> 7/30/2019 12:17 PM >>>
Hi there,
I hope this email finds you well. I'm reaching out regarding Jeffrey Epstein's hearing tomorrow. Can you please provide us with more information on the timing and if there are any expectations for tomorrow.
Thank you so much, I appreciate it!
[b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
NY1 News
[b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @Charter.com
(347)491-[b)(6)
The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are intended solely for the addressee(s) and may contain confidential and/or legally privileged information. If you are not the intended recipient of this message or if this message has been addressed to you in error, please immediately alert the sender by reply e-mail and then delete this message and any attachments. If you are not the intended recipient, you are notified that any use, dissemination, distribution, copying, or storage of this message or any attachment is strictly prohibited.
Page 5611
DOJ-OGR-00024406
